settings.title: Innovating Hand Health with DRYE
settings.subtitle: At DRYE, we believe that comfort and skin health should go hand in hand
settings.content: Our mission is simple yet impactful: to create a glove that genuinely protects hands by keeping moisture away from the skin, preserving the skin’s natural barrier, and reducing irritation.

settings.title: Born from Personal Experience, Driven by a Need for Change
settings.content: Founded on a deep personal journey with atopic eczema, our company was born from the realization that existing solutions often fell short. Our founder’s path to DRYE began with years of frustration—endless products, treatments, and advice that over-promised and under-delivered. From sweaty hands in construction school to dealing with eczema flare-ups, these challenges inspired the development of DRYE gloves. We wanted to create a glove that prioritized practicality and reliability. Crafted to meet real needs, offering a solution that allowed people to work, live and play without constant distraction of skin discomfort.

settings.title: Eco-friendly materials, water-conserving, and recyclable.
settings.content: At DRYE, we believe in hand protection that cares for the planet. Our glove liners are crafted from sustainably sourced wood cellulose, a renewable material that uses minimal water and pesticides. Through our closed-loop production process, we recycle 99% of solvents, significantly reducing water usage and emissions. Each biodegradable, recyclable glove is designed to last 3 to 12 months, offering a durable, eco-conscious choice that supports a smaller environmental footprint.

settings.title: Meeting the Needs of Diverse Industries
settings.content: Today, DRYE gloves are helping thousands across various industries—from hockey players and construction workers to electric vehicle technicians and everyday consumers. By minimizing sweat buildup and friction, our gloves promote hand health, enabling users to focus on their work, hobbies, and lives without the constant worry of skin irritation. Whether used in demanding environments or for daily comfort, DRYE gloves offer a practical and versatile solution for maintaining healthy, irritation-free hands.
